Name: Cold Hill
About the game: Cold Hill is a 2D pixel art action platformer game. Find your way through dozens of obstacles, jump precisely, fight enemies. Explore forest, caves and mountains. Help people from the forest and find out the truth about who is the real enemy. Find your way through dozens of handmade obstacles and challenges and jump precisely to get over them. Explore forest, caves and mountains. Fight various enemies by using your own power or by using environment.
